text: No Luck yet, I'll try this option and get back to you. Thank you

Hi everyone - Hoping I can get some assistance diagnosing an issue I am having with CTAs dropping part of the tracking code.  We use standard UTM codes in our buttons and links but add an &r=[internal code] Here is an example: <https://www.worthybonds.com?utm_source=HubSpot&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=2024_tax_newsletter&utm_content=&utm_term=&r=2024_tax_newsletter>
When adding this to our buttons, the links carry all the code but when using a CTA, it drops the r= code and our back end systems cannot track the link activity. Anyone had a similar experience and have some advice? Thanks in advance.
